Room.Name: The Gladiator Pits
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a blood-filled room known as the Gladiator Pits.
Room.LongDescription: The coarse sand beneath your feet absorbs the blood of past victims of both the gladiators and the participants (mostly the latter). The gladiators are ruthless fighters who will waste no time in attacking you when you least expect it. There are a number of different levels of gladiators, but most of them look the same. To the west is the Monster's Feeding Grounds, where combatants fight non-humanoid monsters who are hungry for dinner.
